00245    template <class Interaction>
00246    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::PairPotentialImpl(Simulation& simulation)
00247     : PairPotential(simulation),
00248       interactionPtr_(0)
00249    {  
00250       interactionPtr_ = new Interaction;
00251       nAtomType_ =  simulation.nAtomType();
00252    }

00254    /* 
00255    * Default constructor.
00256    */
00257    template <class Interaction>
00258    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::PairPotentialImpl()
00259     : PairPotential(),
00260       interactionPtr_(0)
00261    {  interactionPtr_ = new Interaction; }
00262  
00263    /* 
00264    * Destructor. 
00265    */
00266    template <class Interaction>
00267    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~PairPotentialImpl() 
00268    {
00269       if (interactionPtr_) {
00270          delete interactionPtr_;
00271          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00272       }
00273    }

00275    template <class Interaction>
00276    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00277    {
00278       readBegin(in,"PairPotential");
00279       bool nextIndent = false;
00280       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00281       readPairListParam(in);
00282       readEnd(in);
00283    }

00295    template <class Interaction> double 
00296    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::pairEnergy(double rsq, 
00297                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00298    { return interaction().energy(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00322    /*
00323    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00324    */
00325    template <class Interaction>
00326    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForces()
00327    {  
00328        if (methodId() == 0) {
00329           computeForcesList(); 
00330        } else
00331        if (methodId() == 1) {
00332           computeForcesCell(); 
00333        } else {
00334           computeForcesNSq(); 
00335        }
00336    }
00337 
00338    /*
00339    * Compute total pair energy on all processors.
00340    */
00341    template <class Interaction>
00342    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00343    void 
00344    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00345    #else
00346    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00347    #endif
00348    {
00349       // Do nothing (return) if energy is already set.
00350       if (isEnergySet()) return;
00351  
00352       double localEnergy = 0.0; 
00353       if (methodId() == 0) {
00354          localEnergy = energyList(); 
00355       } else 
00356       if (methodId() == 1) {
00357          localEnergy = energyCell(); 
00358       } else {
00359          localEnergy = energyNSq(); 
00360       }
00361 
00362       // Add localEnergy from all nodes, set energy to sum on master.
00363       reduceEnergy(localEnergy, communicator);
00364    }
00365 
00366    /*
00367    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00368    */
00369    template <class Interaction>
00370    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyList()
00371    {
00372       Vector f;
00373       double rsq;
00374       double energy = 0.0;
00375       PairIterator iter;
00376       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00377       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00378       int    type0, type1;
00379       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00380          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00381             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00382             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00383             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00384             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00385             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00386             rsq = f.square();
00387             energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00388          }
00389       } else {
00390          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00391             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00392             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00393             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00394             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00395             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00396             rsq = f.square();
00397             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00398                energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00399             } else {
00400                energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00401             }
00402          }
00403       }
00404       return energy;
00405    }
00406 
00407    /*
00408    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00409    */
00410    template <class Interaction>
00411    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesList()
00412    {
00413       Vector f;
00414       double rsq;
00415       PairIterator iter;
00416       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00417       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00418       int    type0, type1;
00419 
00420       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00421 
00422          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00423             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00424             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00425             rsq = f.square();
00426             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00427             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00428             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00429             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00430             atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00431          }
00432 
00433       } else {
00434 
00435          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00436             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00437             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00438             rsq = f.square();
00439             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00440             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00441             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00442             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00443             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00444                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00445             }
00446          }
00447 
00448       }
00449    }
00450 
00451    /*
00452    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00453    */
00454    template <class Interaction>
00455    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyCell()
00456    {
00457       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00458       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00459       Vector f;
00460       double rsq;
00461       double energy = 0.0;
00462       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00463       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00464       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00465       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00466 
00467       // Iterate over linked list of local cells.
00468       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00469       while (cellPtr) {
00470          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors, reverseUpdateFlag());
00471          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00472          nn = neighbors.size();
00473          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00474             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00475             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00476 
00477             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00478             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00479                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00480                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00481                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00482                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00483                   rsq = f.square();
00484                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00485                }
00486             }
00487 
00488             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00489             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00490                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00491                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00492                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00493                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00494                   rsq = f.square();
00495                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00496                }
00497             } else {
00498                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00499                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00500                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00501                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00502                   rsq = f.square();
00503                   if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00504                      energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00505                   } else {
00506                      energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00507                   }
00508                }
00509             }
00510 
00511          }
00512          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00513       } // while (cellPtr) 
00514       return energy;
00515    }
00516 
00517    /*
00518    * Increment atomic forces using Cell List (private).
00519    */
00520    template <class Interaction>
00521    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesCell()
00522    {
00523       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00524       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00525       Vector f;
00526       double rsq;
00527       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00528       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00529       const Cell* cellPtr;
00530       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00531 
00532       // Iterate over local cells.
00533       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00534       while (cellPtr) {
00535          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors);
00536          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00537          nn = neighbors.size();
00538          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00539             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00540             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00541             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00542             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00543                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00544                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00545                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00546                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00547                   rsq = f.square();
00548                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00549                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00550                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00551                }
00552             }
00553 
00554             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00555             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00556                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00557                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00558                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00559                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00560                   rsq = f.square();
00561                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00562                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00563                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00564                }
00565             } else {
00566                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00567                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00568                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00569                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00570                   rsq = f.square();
00571                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00572                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00573                   if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00574                      atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00575                   }
00576                }
00577             }
00578 
00579          }
00580          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00581       } // while (cellPtr) 
00582    }
00583 
00584    /*
00585    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00586    */
00587    template <class Interaction>
00588    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyNSq()
00589    {
00590       Vector f;
00591       double rsq;
00592       double energy = 0.0;
00593       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00594       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00595       int id0, id1, type0, type1;
00596 
00597       // Iterate over local atom 0
00598       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00599       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00600          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00601          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00602 
00603          // Iterate over local atom 1
00604          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00605          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00606             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00607             if (id0 < id1) {
00608                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00609                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00610                   rsq = f.square();
00611                   type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00612                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00613                }
00614             }
00615          }
00616 
00617          // Iterate over ghost atoms
00618          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00619          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00620             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00621                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00622                if (id0 < id1) {
00623                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00624                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00625                      rsq = f.square();
00626                      type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00627                      energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00628                   }
00629                }
00630             }
00631          } else {
00632             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00633                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00634                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00635                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00636                   rsq = f.square();
00637                   type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00638                   energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00639                }
00640             }
00641          }
00642 
00643       }
00644       return energy;
00645    }
00646 
00647    /*
00648    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00649    */
00650    template <class Interaction>
00651    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesNSq()
00652    {
00653       Vector f;
00654       double rsq;
00655       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00656       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00657       int           type0, type1, id0, id1;
00658 
00659       // Iterate over atom 0
00660       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00661       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00662          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00663          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00664 
00665          // Iterate over local atom 1
00666          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00667          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00668             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00669             if (id0 < id1) {
00670                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00671                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00672                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00673                   rsq = f.square();
00674                   type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00675                   // Set vector force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00676                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00677                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00678                   atomIter1->force() -= f;
00679                }
00680             }
00681          }
00682 
00683          // Iterate over ghosts
00684          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00685          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00686 
00687             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00688                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00689                if (id0 < id1) {
00690                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00691                      // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00692                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00693                      rsq = f.square();
00694                      type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00695                      // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00696                      f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00697                      atomIter0->force() += f;
00698                      ghostIter->force() -= f;
00699                      // Note: If reverseUpdateFlag, increment ghost force 
00700                   }
00701                }
00702             }
00703 
00704          } else {
00705 
00706             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00707                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00708                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00709                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00710                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00711                   rsq = f.square();
00712                   type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00713                   // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00714                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00715                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00716                   // Note: If !reverseUpdateFlag, do not increment ghost force 
00717                }
00718             }
00719 
00720          }
00721 
00722       }
00723    }
00724 
00725    /*
00726    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00727    */
00728    template <class Interaction>
00729    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00730    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00731    #else
00732    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress()
00733    #endif
00734    {
00735       // Do nothing if stress is already set.
00736       if (isStressSet()) return;
00737  
00738       Tensor localStress;
00739       Vector dr;
00740       Vector f;
00741       double rsq, forceOverR;
00742       PairIterator iter;
00743       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00744       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00745       int    type0, type1;
00746 
00747       localStress.zero();
00748       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00749 
00750          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00751             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00752             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00753             rsq = dr.square();
00754             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00755             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00756             f = dr;
00757             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00758             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00759          }
00760 
00761       } else {
00762 
00763          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00764             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00765             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00766             rsq = dr.square();
00767             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00768             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00769             f = dr;
00770             forceOverR = interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00771             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00772             if (atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00773                forceOverR *= 0.5;
00774             }
00775             f *= forceOverR;
00776             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00777          }
00778 
00779       }
00780 
00781       // Normalize by volume 
00782       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00783 
00784       // Add localStress from all nodes, set stress to sum on master.
00785       reduceStress(localStress, communicator);
00786    }
00787 
00788    /*
00789    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00790    */
00791    template <class Interaction>
00792    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00793    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesAndStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00794    #else
00795    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesAndStress()
00796    #endif
00797    {
00798       // If stress is already set, just calculate forces
00799       if (isStressSet()) {
00800          computeForces();
00801          return;
00802       }
00803  
00804       Tensor localStress;
00805       Vector dr;
00806       Vector f;
00807       double rsq, forceOverR;
00808       PairIterator iter;
00809       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00810       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00811       int    type0, type1;
00812 
00813       localStress.zero();
00814       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00815 
00816          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00817             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00818             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00819             rsq = dr.square();
00820             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00821             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00822             f = dr;
00823             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00824             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00825             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00826             atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00827             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00828          }
00829 
00830       } else {
00831 
00832          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00833             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00834             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00835             rsq = dr.square();
00836             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00837             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00838             f  = dr;
00839             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00840             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00841             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00842             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00843                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00844                incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00845             } else { // if atom 1 is a ghost
00846                f *= 0.5;
00847                incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00848             }
00849          }
00850 
00851       }
00852 
00853       // Normalize by volume 
00854       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00855 
00856       // Add localStress from all nodes, set stress to sum on master.
00857       reduceStress(localStress, communicator);
00858    }
00859 
00860    /*
00861    * Compute total pair energies (Call on all processors).
00862    */
00863    template <class Interaction>
00864    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00865    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computePairEnergies(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00866    #else
00867    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computePairEnergies()
00868    #endif
00869    {
00870       Vector f;
00871       double rsq;
00872       double energy = 0.0;
00873       PairIterator iter;
00874       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00875       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00876       int    type0, type1;
00877 
00878       DMatrix<double> localPairEnergies;
00879       localPairEnergies.allocate(nAtomType_, nAtomType_);
00880       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00881          for (int j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00882             localPairEnergies(i,j) = 0.0;
00883          }
00884       }
00885 
00886       //if (methodId() == 0) {
00887       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00888          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00889             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00890             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00891             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00892             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00893             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00894             rsq = f.square();
00895             energy = interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00896             localPairEnergies(type0,type1) += energy;
00897          }
00898       } else {
00899          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00900             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00901             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00902             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00903             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00904             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00905             rsq = f.square();
00906             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00907                energy = interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00908             } else {
00909                energy = 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00910             } 
00911             localPairEnergies(type0,type1) += energy;
00912          }
00913       }
00914 
00915       DMatrix<double> totalPairEnergies;
00916       totalPairEnergies.allocate(nAtomType_, nAtomType_);
00917       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00918          for (int j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00919             totalPairEnergies(i,j) = 0.0;
00920          }
00921       }
00922 
00923       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00924       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00925          for (int j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00926             communicator.Reduce(&localPairEnergies(i,j), &totalPairEnergies(i,j), 1,
00927                                  MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00928          }
00929       }
00930       if (communicator.Get_rank() == 0) {
00931          setPairEnergies(totalPairEnergies);
00932       } else {
00933          unsetPairEnergies();
00934       }
00935       #else
00936       setPairEnergies(localPairEnergies);
00937       #endif
00938    }
00939 
00940 }
00941 #endif
Generated on Fri Aug 31 2012 22:26:37 for Simpatico by  1.7.3
